com.github.spranshu1.aws.utils.sqs

Class SqsQueueHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.spranshu1.aws.utils.sqs.SqsQueueHelper

  • public class SqsQueueHelper
extends Object
    Send Message to a particular queue with 'queueName' or Receive Message from 'queueName'
